tweets.text:
RT @ElonClipsX: Elon Musk: The narrative saying I didn't create Tesla is wrong.

Joe Rogan: ‚ÄúYou came in at Tesla in the beginning, but the‚Ä¶

retweet.text:
Elon Musk: The narrative saying I didn't create Tesla is wrong.

Joe Rogan: ‚ÄúYou came in at Tesla in the beginning, but they were already doing something, right?‚Äù

Elon: ‚ÄúNo, Tesla did not exist in any meaningful form. There were no employees. JB Straubel and I joined three other people. There was no car, there was no nothing.‚Äù

Joe Rogan: ‚ÄúSo there wasn't even a prototype yet?‚Äù 

Elon: ‚ÄúNo.‚Äù 

Joe Rogan: ‚ÄúOh, okay. That's a funny narrative that people like to say that you didn't even create Tesla then.‚Äù 

Elon: ‚ÄúYeah, that's wrong.‚Äù

The Joe Rogan Experience, February 28, 2025

tweets.text: Soon, this will be easy to do

quoted.text:
Here are a few simple prompt tricks you can use to make videos like this in Grok Imagine:

1) Write like a movie director
Use scene verbs: ‚Äústarts with‚Äù ‚Äúcuts to‚Äù ‚Äúcamera follows‚Äù ‚Äúends with.‚Äù

2) Control the camera
Mention angles: ‚Äúwide shot‚Äù ‚Äúoverhead‚Äù ‚Äúclose-up‚Äù ‚Äútracking‚Äù ‚Äúhandheld‚Äù ‚Äúlow-angle‚Äù

3) Guide the speed
Add words like: ‚Äúsmooth flow‚Äù ‚Äúnatural rhythm‚Äù ‚Äúfast transitions‚Äù ‚Äúbalanced motion‚Äù

4) Set lighting 
Use: ‚Äúsoft cinematic lighting‚Äù ‚Äúdramatic contrast‚Äù ‚Äúrealistic shadows‚Äù

Finish with keywords like:
"ultra-realistic cinematic" "vintage film", etc.

tweets.text:
RT @DevinOlsenn: I would agree with this. 
Although V14 has a few issues, it is still incredible to watch it solve problems in real time an‚Ä¶

retweet.text:
I would agree with this. 
Although V14 has a few issues, it is still incredible to watch it solve problems in real time and react to road hazards faster than V13 ever could. 
This morning on my drive the car started slowing down (nicely) and signaling while I was driving on the highway. At first I was confused why it was doing that, but then I saw a woman in all black walking her dog on the side of the road. 
The car 100% saw and reacted to her before I did.

quoted.text: FSD 14.1.1‚Äôs perception system is starting to wildly outperform mine. it‚Äôs wild to see
